channel.title: Personal Projects on Léon Fievet - Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Personal Projects on Léon Fievet - Portfolio

item.title: SkyFuel - Drone Battery Management App
item.author: fievet.leon@free.fr (Léon Fievet)
item.description: SkyFuel is an Android application dedicated to the efficient management of drone batteries, allowing pilots and operators to maintain their batteries in good condition and optimize their lifespan.

item.title: FlightCore - Open Source Flight Controller
item.author: fievet.leon@free.fr (Léon Fievet)
item.description: Open source flight controller for FPV racing drones, developed in embedded Rust with real-time performance and maximum safety.

item.title: GoMetrics - Distributed Monitoring System
item.author: fievet.leon@free.fr (Léon Fievet)
item.description: Distributed monitoring system developed in Go, capable of handling millions of metrics per second with minimal latency.

item.title: PixEngine - 2D Game Engine in Rust
item.author: fievet.leon@free.fr (Léon Fievet)
item.description: Modern 2D game engine written in Rust, leveraging the language’s memory safety and performance to create smooth gaming experiences on the web.

item.title: Discord Bot for Community Management
item.author: fievet.leon@free.fr (Léon Fievet)
item.description: Discord Bot for Community Management # Development of a Discord bot to facilitate the management of a gaming community.

item.title: Athletics Club Website
item.author: fievet.leon@free.fr (Léon Fievet)
item.description: Athletics Club Website # Design and development of the official website for the Saint-Gély-du-Fesc athletics club.
